MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA7 area of Ayr, affecting properties in Blairstone Mains and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 3:45pm to remove generators and restore customers to main supply line and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 4:15pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 3:15 PM on Monday, 04 January 2021.
